CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To measure the field effect mobility of the charge carriers , OTFT were fabricated on a silicon wafer using a bottom contact geometry ( channel length L = 12 μm , and width , W = 120 μm ) under nitrogen.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| silicon |
| nitrogen |

Explanation:

* "silicon wafer" is mentioned as the substrate on which the organic thin-film transistors (OTFT) were fabricated. Silicon is a semiconductor material.
* "nitrogen" is mentioned as the atmosphere in which the OTFT fabrication was carried out.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| silicon |

Explanation:

* "silicon wafer" is mentioned as the substrate on which the organic thin-film transistors (OTFT) were fabricated. Silicon is a semiconductor material.
* "nitrogen" is not a material name in this context, but an atmosphere. It is not a clear material name, so it is not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To measure the field effect mobility of the charge carriers , OTFT were fabricated on a silicon wafer using a bottom contact geometry ( channel length L = 12 μm , and width , W = 120 μm ) under nitrogen.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| field effect mobility |
| channel length L |
| width W |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "field effect mobility", "channel length L", and "width W". These are all single phrases that describe physical properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| field effect mobility |

The only clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "field effect mobility". The other entities, "channel length L" and "width W", are properties of the physical layout of the OTFT device, not material properties.

PV.content:

Paragraph: To measure the field effect mobility of the charge carriers , OTFT were fabricated on a silicon wafer using a bottom contact geometry ( channel length L = 12 μm , and width , W = 120 μm ) under nitrogen.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| channel length L = 12 μm |
| width W = 120 μm |

Note: μm stands for micrometer. These are the only two "Property Value" entities found in the given paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| channel length L = 12 μm |
| width W = 120 μm |

The other entities such as "OTFT", "silicon wafer", "nitrogen", and "bottom contact geometry" are not "Value of material property" entities. They are either device or material names, or environmental conditions.
